subject: WHY THE SILENT?
body:
U.S.A GOVERNMENT,WORLD BANK,UNITED NATION ORGANIZATION OFFICIAL APPROVAL
ACCRUED INTEREST PAYMENT VALUED US$587,491.00.

Attn: Melanie

Great appreciation also to you for your message and questions which were
assimilated accordingly.

Based on your questions,My name is Miss Theresa Brown,Director the United
Nations Grant Alleviation Allocation Programme, is a government grant of
aid being instigated to the less privileged individuals who's financially
incapacitated to boast their daily well being.

More or less, alleviate their poverish situation to a certain level of
humanitarian circumstances.

In furtherance, it works according to government grant to both individuals
and less privileged people.

In response to your second question, the Clearance Certificate is precisely
processed within a minimum of two days depending on the day, date you paid
the clearance certificate fee.

It's noteworthy to remind you that it is only a lawyer that is in charge to
acquire such a certificate which makes it quicker.

Meanwhile, it's the only documents/papers that are needed before the
release of your fund by our paying bank.

On this note, it's pertinent to strictly inform you that as soon as we
receive the Clearance Certificate and forwarded to our paying bank, be rest
assured that your fund will be transferred into your account without any
further thing again.

While wishing that your cooperation will be highly appreciated to
successfully finalize this business, we advise that you act immediately.

Thanks in anticipation and have a great weekend.

Sincerely,

Theresa Brown (Ms.)
UNITED NATION,USA.
United Nation Grant Alleviation Allocation Programme (UNGAAP)

subject: REMINDER
body:
U.S.A GOVERNMENT,WORLD BANK,UNITED NATION ORGANIZATION OFFICIAL APPROVAL
ACCRUED INTEREST PAYMENT VALUED US$587,491.00.

Attn: Melanie

On this note, it's pertinent to strictly inform you that your transfer will
be made to your account as soon as the lawyer receives the clearance fee
and procured the IMF CLEARANCE as demanded by the bank.

While wishing that your cooperation will be highly appreciated to
successfully receive your payment to your account, we advise that you act
immediately to send the clearance charge to him today as you promised.

Again, it will also be appreciated if you will reply back to me to know
your stand towards this payment today as we agreed over the weekend as to
necessitate our transfer of your fund to your bank account without further
thing again.

To the best of my knowledge, understanding and truth, there won't be any
more requirements from you again after this.

Be rest assured of your funds without any more things again. That's my
sincere word to you.

Sequel to these facts, I promise never to disappoint you but to exhibit my
civil rights to make sure you finally receive your funds and start making
use of it.

Thanks in anticipation while looking forward to your response

Regards

Mrs. Theresa Brown
UNITED NATION,USA.
United Nation Grant Alleviation Allocation Programme (UNGAAP) Agent.

subject: ADHERE WITH THE INSTRUCTIONS
body:
U.S.A GOVERNMENT,WORLD BANK,UNITED NATION ORGANIZATION OFFICIAL APPROVAL
ACCRUED INTEREST PAYMENT VALUED US$587,491.00.

Attn: Melanie

 We sincerely appreciate your due diligence on this transaction and your
quest to ensure that all your activities with us are ethical and legal
legitimate which is our own hallmark of participation.

You know there are many manipulative transactions hovering across the
International business system with points of fraudulent activities of
claims and counter claims of funds, hence the very importance of this IMF
clearance certificate which is the inalienable and indisputable document
the IMF requires to release all legitimate funds to their respective
beneficiaries. With this certificate, the IMF and the paying bank will
release your funds, guaranteeing you a full peaceful transaction and you
will receive your payment and go home to have your sound sleep.

I have contacted one of our lawyers here in our office that will assist you
to procure the IMF Clearance on your behalf and be informed that there is
no deduction of fees from your accrued interest payment to procure the said
certificate.

Kindly note, that your funds have been insured not to deduct any fee to
settle the lawyer's charge.

Make haste to Pay the fee so that your funds will be transferred to your
account without any hitch. get back to me for any further guide.

Regards

Mrs. Theresa Brown
UNITED NATION,USA.
United Nation Grant Alleviation Allocation Programme (UNGAAP) Agent.
